statements: SELECT * FROM cloud_spending
SELECT report_name, cost FROM cloud_spending ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT id, report_name FROM cloud_spending WHERE cost > 1000
SELECT * FROM cloud_spending WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT report_date, SUM(cost) AS total_cost FROM cloud_spending GROUP BY report_date
SELECT * FROM cloud_spending WHERE cost > 1000 ORDER BY report_date DESC, id ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT report_name, cost FROM cloud_spending WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY cost DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT report_name, cost FROM cloud_spending WHERE cost < 500 AND report_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY report_name LIMIT 20
SELECT id, report_name, cost FROM cloud_spending WHERE report_name LIKE '%monthly%' ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM cloud_spending WHERE cost = (SELECT MAX(cost) FROM cloud_spending)
SELECT * FROM cloud_spending ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT resource_name, cost FROM cloud_spending WHERE cost > 1000;
SELECT MIN(cost) AS min_cost, MAX(cost) AS max_cost FROM cloud_spending;
SELECT AVG(cost) AS avg_cost, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM cloud_spending WHERE resource_name LIKE 'Database%';
SELECT DATE(analysis_date) AS analysis_date, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM cost_analysis GROUP BY analysis_date ORDER BY analysis_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM cloud_spending WHERE cost > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT resource_name, AVG(cost) AS average_cost FROM cloud_spending GROUP BY resource_name HAVING COUNT(id) > 1;
SELECT analysis_id, spending_category, amount, analysis_date FROM cost_analysis ORDER BY analysis_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT resource_name, TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR, timestamp, NOW()) AS hours_since_timestamp FROM cloud_spending WHERE resource_name LIKE 'App%';
SELECT AVG(cost) AS average_cost, MAX(cost) AS max_cost, MIN(cost) AS min_cost FROM cloud_spending WHERE timestamp >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM cloud_spending_reports;
SELECT report_date, report_name FROM cloud_spending_reports WHERE total_cost > 1000;
SELECT data_id, spending_category, amount_spent FROM cost_analysis_data WHERE date_of_analysis = '2022-02-15';
SELECT visualization_id, chart_type, data_source FROM visualization_data WHERE report_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT report_name, total_cost FROM cloud_spending_reports ORDER BY total_cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM cloud_spending_reports;
SELECT report_name, total_cost FROM cloud_spending_reports WHERE total_cost > 1000;
SELECT visualization_id, chart_type, visualization_image FROM visualization_data ORDER BY visualization_id DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_name, report_date FROM cloud_spending_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM cost_analysis_data WHERE spending_category = 'Infrastructure' AND amount_spent < 5000 ORDER BY date_of_analysis ASC;
SELECT id, date, category, amount FROM cloud_spending;
SELECT * FROM cost_analysis WHERE cost > 1000;
SELECT date, resource_name FROM cost_analysis ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT report_name, summary FROM report_summary WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT chart_type, data FROM visualization_data ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM cloud_spending WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT category, AVG(amount) FROM cloud_spending GROUP BY category HAVING AVG(amount) > 500
SELECT date, resource_name, cost FROM cost_analysis WHERE cost BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY cost DESC
SELECT MAX(cost) AS highest_cost, resource_name FROM cost_analysis GROUP BY resource_name ORDER BY highest_cost DESC
SELECT date, report_name, CONCAT('Summary: ', summary) AS report_summary FROM report_summary WHERE date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM cloud_services;
SELECT service_name, service_category FROM cloud_services ORDER BY service_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM spending_records WHERE spending_amount > 100;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'J%';
SELECT report_id, report_name FROM reports WHERE report_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT service_name, service_category, service_cost FROM cloud_services;
SELECT * FROM spending_records WHERE spending_amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT report_name, report_description FROM reports ORDER BY report_id DESC;
SELECT visualization_type, visualization_data FROM visualization_data WHERE user_id = 1;
